> It seems unfortunate that this filtering support is tied to a
> test class.

I don't see how you come to this conclusion. It looks to me as if a Filter
applies to an arbitrary request object, wherever it's coming from. I'd also
wager that it wouldn't be too hard to implement a Filter that uses a
scripting language to decide which tests to filter.

Cheers, Ilja
